Logilab's common library

[show private | hide private]
[frames | no frames]

Module Hierarchy

  • fileutils: Some file / file path manipulation utilities.
  • modutils: Python modules manipulation utility functions.
  • textutils: Some text manipulation utility functions.

Class Hierarchy

  • exceptions.Exception: Common base class for all exceptions.
    • logilab.common.modutils.NoSourceFile: exception raised when we are not able to get a python source file for a precompiled file
    • logilab.common.fileutils.UnresolvableError: exception raised by relative path when it's unable to compute relative path between two paths
